text: Is there an endpoint for sync-errors after ecomm bridge API was deprecated? could someone please share.

looking for a substitute to this endpoint -

`<https://api.hubapi.com/extensions/ecomm/v1/sync-errors>?`

:wave-yeti: Hello everyone.:sprocket:

I have a problem sending several files in the JSON to the forms API. I am using this endpoint '`<https://api.hsforms.com/submissions/v3/integration/submit/>'`. I checked <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Forms-API-Associated-hidden-file-with-form/m-p/342520/highlight/true#M33495|this >article, but it has not worked for me. The flow I follow is:

1. I get the files and upload them via the files API '`<https://api.hubapi.com/files/v3/files>`' 
2. I get the URL and add it to the JSON with the information from the form. (first image)
3. I make use of the form API sending the data. The field I want to add the files to is `Upload Documents Here`
In HubSpot, the information appears correctly (second image), but in the files section, only one of the files is there. I think it is the first one that is selected.

Anyone who can give me an idea how to solve it? :pray:

Hello Everyone,
How to retrieve a contact's user token (HubSpotutk) through API?

Hello Everyone,
I'm trying to find out what this API call does on the HubPot site: <https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/contact/batch> but I don't find it in the API reference guide. Is anyone familiar with it?
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/batch_create_or_update>
Maybe this: <https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/contact/batch> is archived somewhere. I noticed that many API endpoints are V3 now.
It's a old endpoint for creating or updating groups of contacts
Thanks Carter!
of course
Definitely use the V3 or 4 apis for things that you build (I don't think you were building just a PSA )

What is the best way to upload a large csv file programatically to the hub spot crm?  I have a 100M+ file of sales orders I would like to upload on a nightly basis.  I was reading about the HS cli.  Would using the cli be the best approach?

What is the best way to upload a large csv file programatically to the hub spot crm? I have a 100M+ file of sales orders I would like to upload on a nightly basis. I was reading about the HS cli. Would using the cli be the best approach?
Hey Rodney, So the imports api is definitely going to be the best option for this <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/imports>
It is limited to 80M rows per day though
And you do need to batch the files in batches of 1,048,576 rows
Hey <@U01QVR44MEY>, sorry for being looping you in here, I saw you are really knowledgeable so maybe you can help us with this :smile:

So 2 things here:

1. You're field in the form might not allow for multiple files, so definitely make sure it allows for multiple files.
2. The little arrow icon will only link out to the first link in that field, but the other links are ; separated out in that field if you click view more.
I don't know where to find the first option you mention. I don't know if it is because it is a non-HubSpot form. :thinkonk:
because we have one that is a HubSpot form and it does appear. But in one that is not, I'm not sure
How can I get the Id of a company or contact associated with a deal? When I fetch a deal from the Api it seems to not contain any id from a contact, only from the owner. Any Tips?
In the field is there a ;?
you can use Association API endpoint - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/associations>

you say in values?

I have been guided by <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Forms-API-Associated-hidden-file-with-form/m-p/342520/highlight/true#M33495|this >entry, and so I send it multiple times. Yesterday I tried to send it separated by commas and semicolons, but it didn't work. If you say it could be that, I'll try again.

Sanity check: Submissions to the (authenticated) <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form_v3_authentication|V3 Forms API>:

Shouldn't the POST requests log to the API call log? I'm testing this with both a Private App token and OAuth token via dev/public app, and despite successfully creating contacts through this API, the success logs do not appear under either app.

Did these ever log on success, or am I misremembering?

Thank you!
But on the property level do you have the allow multiple files selected
I'll take a look at it, since I don't have permission to edit it. Thanks :+1:

I think that we cannot change or modify the property configuration. It shows us this warning, so we will try creating another property and see if it is misconfigured.

Thanks for your help :+1:

of course, it's really nice, you can associate records though it as well

Hello all . Wondering if someone has recently faced an issue with V2 search api giving back no results specific to BLOG_POST . Works well with SITE_PAGE
<https://api.hubapi.com/contentsearch/v2/search?portalId=2082317&term=${searchTerm}&type=BLOG_POST|https://api.hubapi.com/contentsearch/v2/search?portalId=XXXXX&term=${searchTerm}&type=BLOG_POST>
